document.title: My Journey Finding 5 Truly Unique Gifts for a Video Game Obsessive
document.description: I went on a mission to find 5 items for my gamer friend that weren't just another headset or mousepad. Here's what I found.
document.author: Walid Bichri

body.raw:
## My Quest for the Perfect Gamer Gift

My best friend is a lifelong video game obsessive, and his birthday was coming up. I wanted to get him something more thoughtful than just another Steam gift card.
body.html:
My Quest for the Perfect Gamer Gift

My best friend is a lifelong video game obsessive, and his birthday was coming up. I wanted to get him something more thoughtful than just another Steam gift card.
